definition: abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex
clenbuterol hydrochloride (diet pill that burns fat)/e.g. Spiropent
pinyin: yan2 suan1 ke4 lun2 te4 luo1

sentences.english: The drug clenbuterol is not used in the treatment of pigs.
sentences.chinese: 鹽酸克侖特羅這種藥物在豬隻並沒有治療用途。
